resources.string:
Tired of waiting for your teachers to update those attendance online? 
 Ever faced issues with not being able to know your immediate attendance? 

 Worry no more! With this app you can now update your attendance after each hour and keep track of your immediate attendance.
Version 2.0.1 \n Developed by Athul for EC7B
This app is only for personal use and cannot be used to question or compare with the attendance register of the teachers under any circumstainces
Note down the following data periodically to avoid data loss if app stops working or gets uninstalled \nData is of format: Subject name, classes attended and classes bunked
